overview: Andrei is Chief Technology Officer and Co-Founder of LiveRail. In this role, Andrei oversees the design and implementation of LiveRail’s technology stack, products, and infrastructure. Andrei directs the product and engineering on an international level with teams based in San Francisco and Cluj-Napoca, Romania. Before co-founding LiveRail, Andrei founded and held the position of Chief Technology Officer at Trilulilu, Romania’s largest multimedia UGC platform. Prior to Trilulilu, Andrei was Chief Executive Officer of Vuelotech, a start-up specializing in web development and software products. Andrei holds a B.Sc. in Computer Science.
